channel.title: Project Insanity Auto Donator & Auto Vote. Will Rep++
channel.description:
Looking for an auto donation system and auto vote system. Want it to have a tab on my sights nav bar that says "Donate" and "Vote" And you type in your user, click the donation/site you wanna vote on and once it detects you do it you can type ::claimvote and ::claimdonor
Not asking anyone to add for me, just need links or snippets and were to add them. Also will Rep++. Thanks.

item.title: Project Insanity Auto Donator & Auto Vote. Will Rep++
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:4, topic:398581”][quote author=patargangstar link=topic=495717.msg3624195#msg3624195 date=1307690374]
think auto donates kinda something people pay for but its mysql intergration involved i believe
[/quote]
He knows about the mysql, hes asking for sql scripts and such for the auto donating. Quite hard to come upon these days due to Paypal constantly updating.[/quote]

ohhh alright haha thats a little easier then

Read full topic
